info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 23 at 7:15PM MST until August 23 at 10:15PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... South Central Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 1015 PM MST. * At 715 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over Alamo Road 10 to 15 miles southeast of Yucca. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain is estimated by radar to have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of washes, secondary roads and low- lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Alamo Road 10 to 15 miles southeast of Yucca FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
